segmentosSRT.text: I am very sorry, but you've got nothing left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text:
What could you stake the bet on?
We don't accept empty bets.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Anyway, your life's worth little now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: We'll formalize the transfer in a few days...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: and explain to your old man.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Red Guards are swarming over the place.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi is good with his hands.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text:
He painted all the Chairman Maos
in our factory!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Thanks, we'll go to the factory bathhouse.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: You've gone to so much trouble.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Do as Mommy says and push.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text:
This is the same Wang Bin
who once insulted...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: to educate him, to criticize him...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: and to let him witness her giving birth.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24
